basic.description: Boolean algebra applied to digital systems; logic gates; combinational logic design; electronic circuits for logic gates; arithmetic circuits; latches and flip-flops, registers and counters; synchronous sequential logic and state machine design; implementation in programmable logic chips.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Digital Systems

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of APSC171 and APSC172 and APSC174 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
